description: bkit Vibecoding Kit hooks for PDCA workflow automation

hooks.prompt:
bkit Vibecoding Kit v1.1.1 by POPUP STUDIO (https://popupstudio.ai)

Core PDCA Rules (always apply):
- New feature request → Check docs/02-design/ first → Design before code
- No guessing → Check docs → Ask user
- SoR priority: Code > CLAUDE.md > docs/
- After implementation → Suggest gap analysis

Commands: /bkit:learn-claude-code, /bkit:pdca-plan, /bkit:init-starter

For Korean response, add to ~/.claude/settings.json: {"language": "korean"}

Report issues: https://github.com/popup-studio-ai/bkit-claude-code/issues

PDCA validation:
- docs/01-plan/* → ALLOW (Plan phase)
- docs/02-design/* → ALLOW (Design phase)
- docs/03-analysis/* → ALLOW (Check phase)
- docs/04-report/* → ALLOW (Act phase)
- src/* or app/* → Check if related design exists in docs/02-design/
- Other paths → ALLOW

Respond with: {"decision": "approve", "reason": "brief explanation"}

Commit completed. Consider:
1) Update PDCA status if feature complete
2) Run /bkit:pdca-analyze for gap analysis

Respond with: {"decision": "approve", "reason": "Commit done"}

Before compacting, summarize key context to preserve:
1) Current task status
2) Key decisions made
3) Files modified
4) Remaining work

Respond with: {"decision": "approve", "summary": "brief summary"}
